instructions.name: convert_positions
docs: Convert NO positions to YES + collateral (Polymarket-style NegRisk)
Only works for is_one_winner = true markets
Formula: If you hold m NO tokens across different answers, you can convert to:
- (m-1) Ã— amount collateral returned
- amount YES tokens for each complementary answer
The NO tokens are burned (cannot be redeemed)

errors.name: QuestionTooLong
errors.msg: Question exceeds maximum length of 200 characters

errors.name: InvalidResolutionTime
errors.msg: Resolution time must be in the future

errors.name: InsufficientLiquidity
errors.msg: Initial liquidity must be at least 100

errors.name: MarketNotResolved
errors.msg: Market has not been resolved yet

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Only the market creator can perform this action

errors.name: OrderbookFull
errors.msg: Orderbook is full (max 100 orders per side)

errors.name: SlippageExceeded
errors.msg: Slippage exceeded - received fewer shares than minimum

errors.name: NotOneWinnerMarket
errors.msg: This feature is only available for one-winner markets

errors.name: InvalidIndexSet
errors.msg: Invalid index set for position conversion

errors.name: WinnerAlreadyDeclared
errors.msg: A winner has already been declared for this market
